00020 #define MEAN_HIT_NUMBER_LINEAR_APPROX_LIMIT             0.002

00026 void    SGP_SC_get_f1_array_size(       /* radiation field parameters */
00027                                                                         long*   n,
00028                                                                         float*  E_MeV_u,
00029                                                                         long*   particle_no,
00030                                                                         /* detector parameters */
00031                                                                         long*   material_no,
00032                                                                         long*   rdd_model,
00033                                                                         float*  rdd_parameter,
00034                                                                         /* electron range model */
00035                                                                         long*   er_model,
00036                                                                         float*  er_parameter,
00037                                                                         /* Algorithm parameters*/
00038                                                                         long*   N2,
00039                                                                         // from here: return values
00040                                                                         long*   n_bins_f1,
00041                                                                         float*  f1_parameters)
00042 {
00043 #ifdef _DEBUG
00044         indnt_init();
00045         indnt_inc();
00046         fprintf(debf,"%sbegin SGP_SC_get_f1_array_size\n",isp);
00047 #endif
00048 
00049 
00050 #ifdef _R
00051         int n_int = (int)(*n);
00052         *n = (long)n_int;
00053 
00054         int particle_no_int = (int)(*particle_no);
00055         *particle_no = (long)particle_no_int;
00056 
00057         int material_no_int     = (int)(*material_no);
00058         *material_no = (long)material_no_int;
00059 
00060         int rdd_model_int = (int)(*rdd_model);
00061         *rdd_model = (long)rdd_model_int;
00062 
00063         int er_model_int = (int)(*er_model);
00064         *er_model = (long)er_model_int;
00065 
00066         int N2_int = (int)(*N2);
00067         *N2 = (long)N2_int;
00068 #endif
00069 
00070         // get lowest and highest dose
00071         float   d_max_Gy                =       0.0f;
00072         float   d_min_Gy                =       0.0f;
00073 
00074         long    n_f1_parameters =       9;
00075         long    i;
00076         for (i = 0; i < *n; i++){
00077 //              // get RDD parameters for all particles and energies
00078                 SGP_RDD_f1_parameters(  &E_MeV_u[i],
00079                                                                 &particle_no[i],
00080                                                                 material_no,
00081                                                                 rdd_model,
00082                                                                 rdd_parameter,
00083                                                                 /* electron range model */
00084                                                                 er_model,
00085                                                                 er_parameter,
00086                                                                 /* calculated parameters */
00087                                                                 &f1_parameters[i*n_f1_parameters]);
00088                 if(i == 0){
00089                         d_min_Gy                        =       f1_parameters[i*n_f1_parameters + 3];
00090                         d_max_Gy                        =       f1_parameters[i*n_f1_parameters + 4];
00091                 }
00092                 else{
00093                         d_min_Gy                        =       FMIN(d_min_Gy, f1_parameters[i*n_f1_parameters + 3]);
00094                         d_max_Gy                        =       FMAX(d_max_Gy, f1_parameters[i*n_f1_parameters + 4]);
00095                 }
00096         }
00097 
00098         // get number of bins needed to span that dose range
00099         float tmp = (log10f(d_max_Gy/d_min_Gy) / log10f(2.0f) * ((float)*N2));
00100         *n_bins_f1                              =       (long)(floorf(tmp) + 1.0f);
00101 
00102 #ifdef _DEBUG
00103         fprintf(debf,"%stmp = %g\n",isp, tmp);
00104         fprintf(debf,"%sn_bins_f1 = %ld\n",isp, *n_bins_f1);
00105         fprintf(debf,"%send SGP_SC_get_f1_array_size\n",isp);
00106         indnt_dec();
00107 #endif
00108         return;
00109 }

00111 
00112 void    SGP_SC_get_f1(  /* radiation field parameters */
00113                 long*   n,
00114                 float*  E_MeV_u,
00115                 long*   particle_no,
00116                 float*  fluence_cm2,
00117                 /* detector parameters */
00118                 long*   material_no,
00119                 long*   rdd_model,
00120                 float*  rdd_parameter,
00121                 /* electron range model */
00122                 long*   er_model,
00123                 float*  er_parameter,
00124                 /* algorith parameters*/
00125                 long*   N2,
00126                 long*   n_bins_f1,
00127                 /* f1 parameters*/
00128                 float*  f1_parameters,
00129                 // from here: return values
00130                 float*  norm_fluence,
00131                 float*  dose_contribution_Gy,
00132                 float*  f_parameters,
00133                 /*  1 - total fluence_cm2
00134                  *  2 - total_dose_Gy
00135                  *  3 - ave_E_MeV
00136                  *  4 - dw_E_MeV
00137                  *  5 - ave_LET_MeV_cm2_g
00138                  *  6 - dw_LET_MeV_cm2_g
00139                  *  0 - u
00140                  */
00141                 float*  f1_d_Gy,
00142                 float*  f1_dd_Gy,
00143                 float*  f1)
00144 {
00145 
00146 #ifdef _DEBUG
00147         indnt_inc();
00148         fprintf(debf,"%sbegin SGP_SC_get_f1\n",isp);
00149 #endif
00150 
00151 #ifdef _R
00152         int n_int = (int)(*n);
00153         *n = (long)n_int;
00154 
00155         int rdd_model_int = (int)(*rdd_model);
00156         *rdd_model = (long)rdd_model_int;
00157 
00158         int er_model_int = (int)(*er_model);
00159         *er_model = (long)er_model_int;
00160 
00161         int material_no_int     = (int)(*material_no);
00162         *material_no = (long)material_no_int;
00163 
00164         int particle_no_int = (int)(*particle_no);
00165         *particle_no = (long)particle_no_int;
00166 
00167         int N2_int = (int)(*N2);
00168         *N2 = (long)N2_int;
00169 
00170         int n_bins_f1_int = (int)(*n_bins_f1);
00171         *n_bins_f1 = (long)n_bins_f1_int;
00172 #endif
00173 
00174         ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00175         // 1. normalize fluence, get total fluence and dose, eff. LET and mean impact parameter u,
00176         f_parameters[1]         = 0.0f;
00177 
00178         // if fluences < 0 they are supposed to be D.set.Gy, so in that case convert them first
00179         // only the first entry will be check
00180         // feed the results back to the array passed to the routine
00181         long    i;
00182         float*  fluence_cm2_local               =       (float*)calloc(*n, sizeof(float));
00183         if (fluence_cm2[0] >= 0){
00184                 for (i = 0; i < *n; i++){
00185                         fluence_cm2_local[i]            = fluence_cm2[i];
00186                 }
00187         }
00188         else{
00189                 for (i = 0; i < *n; i++){
00190                         fluence_cm2_local[i]            = -1.0f * fluence_cm2[i] / (f1_parameters[i*9] * MeV_g_to_J_kg);                        // fluence / LET
00191                         fluence_cm2[i]                          = fluence_cm2_local[i];
00192                         printf("fluence_cm2[%ld] = %g\n", i, fluence_cm2[i]);
00193                 }
00194         }
00195 
00196 
00197         for (i = 0; i < *n; i++){
00198                 f_parameters[1] +=      fluence_cm2_local[i];
00199         }
00200 
00201         float u_single;
00202         f_parameters[0]                         =       0.0f;
00203         f_parameters[2]                         =       0.0f;
00204         f_parameters[3]                         =       0.0f;
00205         f_parameters[4]                         =       0.0f;
00206         f_parameters[5]                         =       0.0f;
00207         f_parameters[6]                         =       0.0f;
00208 
00209         /*      f1_parameters:
00210          *              0 - LET_MeV_cm2_g
00211          *              1 - r_min_m
00212          *              2 - r_max_m
00213          *              3 - d_min_Gy
00214          *              4 - d_max_Gy
00215          *              5 - k                                           (norm. constant)
00216          *              6 - single_impact_fluence_cm2
00217          *              7 - single_impact_dose_Gy
00218          *              8 - dEdx_MeV_cm2_g
00219          */
00220 
00221         printf("f1_parameters[0] = %g\n", f1_parameters[0]);
00222         printf("f1_parameters[8] = %g\n", f1_parameters[8]);
00223 
00224         for (i = 0; i < *n; i++){
00225                 norm_fluence[i]                         =       fluence_cm2_local[i] / f_parameters[1];
00226                 printf("norm_fluence[%ld] = %g\n", i, norm_fluence[i]);
00227                 u_single                                        =       fluence_cm2_local[i] / f1_parameters[i*9 + 6];
00228                 dose_contribution_Gy[i]         =       u_single * f1_parameters[i*9 + 7];
00229                 printf("dose_contribution_Gy[%ld] = %g\n", i, dose_contribution_Gy[i]);
00230                 f_parameters[2]                         +=      dose_contribution_Gy[i];
00231                 f_parameters[3]                         +=      norm_fluence[i] * E_MeV_u[i];
00232                 f_parameters[4]                         +=      dose_contribution_Gy[i] * E_MeV_u[i];
00233                 f_parameters[5]                         +=      norm_fluence[i] * f1_parameters[i*9 + 0];
00234                 f_parameters[6]                         +=      dose_contribution_Gy[i] * f1_parameters[i*9 + 0];
00235                 f_parameters[0]                         +=      norm_fluence[i] * f1_parameters[i*9 + 7];
00236         }
00237 
00238         f_parameters[4]                         /= f_parameters[2];
00239         f_parameters[6]                         /= f_parameters[2];
00240         f_parameters[0]                         = f_parameters[2] / f_parameters[0];
00241 
00242         ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00243         //  2. create all-over f1-data-frame, if f_d_Gy array passed (i.e. n_bins_f1 == 0)
00244         if(*n_bins_f1 > 0){
00245                 float   d_min                   =       f1_parameters[0*9 + 3];
00246                 float   d_max                   =       f1_parameters[0*9 + 4];
00247 
00248                 for (i = 1; i < *n; i++){
00249                         d_min                                   =       FMIN(f1_parameters[i*9 + 3], d_min);
00250                         d_max                                   =       FMAX(f1_parameters[i*9 + 4], d_max);
00251                 }
00252 
00253                 float   U                               =       (float)(log(2.0f) / (float)(*N2));
00254 
00255 
00256                 float*  d_df_low                        =       (float*)calloc(*n_bins_f1, sizeof(float));
00257                 float*  d_df_mid                        =       (float*)calloc(*n_bins_f1, sizeof(float));
00258                 float*  d_df_high                       =       (float*)calloc(*n_bins_f1, sizeof(float));
00259                 float*  dd_df                           =       (float*)calloc(*n_bins_f1, sizeof(float));
00260 
00261                 for (i = 0; i < *n_bins_f1; i++){
00262                         // TO DO: check if n.bins sufficient
00263 
00264                         d_df_low[i]                                     =       d_min * (float)exp((float)i * U);
00265                         d_df_high[i]                            =       d_min * (float)exp(((float)i + 1) * U);
00266                         d_df_mid[i]                                     =       d_min * (float)exp(((float)i + 0.5f) * U);
00267                         dd_df[i]                                        =       d_df_high[i] - d_df_low[i];                                                     // OBS: using Kellerer's bin-width = mid.point * U is not entirely correct
00268 
00269                         f1[i]                                           =       0.0f;
00270                 }
00271 
00272                 long    n_bins_used                             =       1;
00273 
00274                 // loop over all particles and energies, compute contribution to f1
00275                 long    k;
00276                 for (k = 0; k < *n; k++){
00277 
00278                         float   d_min_k                         =       f1_parameters[k*9 + 3];
00279                         float   d_max_k                         =       f1_parameters[k*9 + 4];
00280 
00281                         // find first and last bin to fit this particle's contribution into the all-over f1-frame
00282                         long    i_low, i_high;
00283                         locate(d_df_low, n_bins_f1, &d_min_k, &i_low);
00284                         locate(d_df_low, n_bins_f1, &d_max_k, &i_high);
00285                         i_low                                           -=      1;
00286                         i_high                                          -=      1;
00287 
00288                         long    n_bins_df                       =       i_high - i_low + 1;  // changed from + 2
00289 
00290 #ifdef _DEBUG
00291                         fprintf(debf,"%sk = %ld , n_bins_df = %ld\n", isp, k, n_bins_df);
00292 #endif
00293 
00294                         if (n_bins_df > 1){
00295                                 float*  d_low                           =       (float*)calloc(n_bins_df, sizeof(float));
00296                                 float*  d_mid                           =       (float*)calloc(n_bins_df, sizeof(float));
00297                                 float*  d_high                          =       (float*)calloc(n_bins_df, sizeof(float));
00298                                 float*  dd                                      =       (float*)calloc(n_bins_df, sizeof(float));
00299                                 float*  r                                       =       (float*)calloc(n_bins_df, sizeof(float));
00300                                 float*  F1_1                            =       (float*)calloc(n_bins_df, sizeof(float));
00301                                 float*  f1_k                            =       (float*)calloc(n_bins_df - 1, sizeof(float));
00302 
00303                                 // extract the corresponding part from the all-over frame
00304                                 for (i = 0; i < n_bins_df; i++){
00305                                         d_low[i]                                        =       d_df_low[i_low + i];
00306                                         d_high[i]                                       =       d_df_high[i_low + i];
00307                                         d_mid[i]                                        =       d_df_mid[i_low + i];
00308                                         dd[i]                                           =       d_high[i] - d_low[i];
00309                                 };
00310 
00311                                 // and adjust the edges
00312                                 d_low[1-1]                                      =       d_min_k;
00313                                 d_low[n_bins_df-1]                      =       d_max_k;
00314 
00315                                 d_mid[1-1]                                      =       (float)sqrt(d_low[1 - 1] * d_high[1 - 1]);
00316                                 d_mid[n_bins_df-1-1]            =       (float)sqrt(d_low[n_bins_df - 1] * d_high[n_bins_df - 1]);
00317                                 d_mid[n_bins_df-1]                      =       0;
00318 
00319                                 d_high[n_bins_df-1-1]           =       d_max_k;
00320                                 d_high[n_bins_df-1]                     =       0.0f;   //??
00321 
00322                                 dd[n_bins_df-1]                         =       0.0f;
00323 
00324                                 // now compute r, F1, and f1, this could be any RDD if implemented
00325                                 SGP_r_RDD_m     (       &n_bins_df,
00326                                                 d_low,
00327                                                 &E_MeV_u[k],
00328                                                 &particle_no[k],
00329                                                 /* detector parameters */
00330                                                 material_no,
00331                                                 /* radial dose distribution model */
00332                                                 rdd_model,
00333                                                 rdd_parameter,
00334                                                 /* electron range model */
00335                                                 er_model,
00336                                                 er_parameter,
00337                                                 r);
00338 
00339                                 for (i = 0; i < n_bins_df; i++){
00340                                         F1_1[i]                                         = (r[i] / f1_parameters[k*9 + 2]) * (r[i] / f1_parameters[k*9 + 2]);}                           // F1 - 1 instead of F1 to avoid numeric cut-off problems
00341 
00342                                 F1_1[n_bins_df-1]               =       0.0f;
00343 
00344                                 // now compute f1 as the derivative of F1
00345                                 for (i = 0; i < (n_bins_df - 1); i++){
00346                                         f1_k[i]                                 =       -1.0f * (F1_1[i + 1] - F1_1[i]) / dd[i];}
00347 
00348                                 // adjust the density in first and last bin, because upper limit is not d.max.Gy and lower not d.min.Gy
00349                                 f1_k[1-1]                               =       f1_k[1-1] * dd[1-1] / dd_df[i_low];
00350                                 f1_k[n_bins_df-1-1]             =       f1_k[n_bins_df-1-1] * dd[n_bins_df-1-1] / dd_df[i_high - 1];
00351 
00352                                 // and paste f1 for this energy /particle into the over all data frame according to rel. fluence
00353                                 for (i = 0; i < (n_bins_df - 1); i++){
00354                                         f1[i_low + i]                   +=      norm_fluence[k] * f1_k[i];}
00355 
00356 
00357                                 free(d_low);
00358                                 free(d_mid);
00359                                 free(d_high);
00360                                 free(dd);
00361                                 free(r);
00362                                 free(F1_1);
00363                                 free(f1_k);
00364                         }
00365                         else{ // n_bins_df == 1
00366                                 f1[i_low ]                              +=      norm_fluence[k] * 1.0f / dd_df[i_low];
00367                         }
00368 
00369                         // remember highest bin used
00370                         n_bins_used                             =       LMAX(n_bins_used, i_high);
00371                 }
00372 
00373                 // copy back for the dose axis
00374                 for (i = 0; i < *n_bins_f1; i++){
00375                         f1_d_Gy[i]              =       d_df_mid[i];
00376                         f1_dd_Gy[i]             =       dd_df[i];
00377                 }
00378 
00379                 free(d_df_low);
00380                 free(d_df_mid);
00381                 free(d_df_high);
00382                 free(dd_df);
00383                 // normalize f1 (should be ok anyway but there could be small round-off errors)
00384                 float   f1_norm         =       0.0f;
00385                 for (i = 0; i < *n_bins_f1; i++){
00386                         f1_norm         +=              f1[i] * f1_dd_Gy[i];
00387                 }
00388                 for (i = 0; i < *n_bins_f1; i++){
00389                         f1[i]           /=              f1_norm;
00390                 }
00391 
00392         } // if(f1_d_Gy != NULL)
00393 
00394         free(fluence_cm2_local);
00395 
00396 #ifdef _DEBUG
00397         fprintf(debf,"%send SGP_SC_get_f1\n", isp);
00398         indnt_dec();
00399 #endif
00400         return;
00401 }
00402 
00403 
00404 void    SGP_SC_get_f_array_size(        float*  u,
00405                 float*  fluence_factor,
00406                 long*   N2,
00407                 long*   n_bins_f1,
00408                 float*  f1_d_Gy,
00409                 float*  f1_dd_Gy,
00410                 float*  f1,
00411                 // from here: return values
00412                 long*   n_bins_f,
00413                 float*  u_start,
00414                 long*   n_convolutions)
00415 {
00416         // Get expectation value of dose from f1
00417         float   d_f1_Gy         =       0.0f;
00418 
00419 #ifdef _DEBUG
00420         indnt_init();
00421         indnt_inc();
00422         fprintf(debf,"%sbegin SGP_SC_get_f_array_size\n", isp);
00423         fprintf(debf,"%sinput - u = %g\n", isp, *u);
00424 //      fprintf(debf,"%sSGP_SC_get_f_array_size 1, fluence_factor = %g\n", isp, *fluence_factor);
00425 //      fprintf(debf,"%sSGP_SC_get_f_array_size 1, N2 = %ld\n", isp, *N2);
00426 //      fprintf(debf,"%sSGP_SC_get_f_array_size 1, n_bins_f1 = %ld\n", isp, *n_bins_f1);
00427 //      fprintf(debf,"%sSGP_SC_get_f_array_size 1, f1_d_Gy = %g\n", isp, f1_d_Gy[0]);
00428 //      fprintf(debf,"%sSGP_SC_get_f_array_size 1, f1_dd_Gy = %g\n", isp, f1_dd_Gy[0]);
00429 //      fprintf(debf,"%sSGP_SC_get_f_array_size 1, f1 = %g\n", isp, f1[0]);
00430 #endif
00431 
00432         // conversion through int
00433 #ifdef _R
00434         int N2_int = (int)(*N2);
00435         *N2 = (long)N2_int;
00436 
00437         int n_bins_f1_int = (int)(*n_bins_f1);
00438         *n_bins_f1 = (long)n_bins_f1_int;
00439 #endif
00440 
00441         long    i;
00442         for (i = 0; i < *n_bins_f1; i++){
00443                 d_f1_Gy         +=      f1_d_Gy[i] * f1_dd_Gy[i] * f1[i];
00444         }
00445 
00446         // The dose set by the input data is therefore
00447         float   d_f_Gy          = (*u) * (*fluence_factor) * d_f1_Gy;
00448 
00449         // How many convolution are necessary starting from a small mean
00450         // impact number that allows linear approximation (e.g. 0.002)
00451         *n_convolutions         = 0;
00452 
00453         *u_start                        =               d_f_Gy  / d_f1_Gy;
00454         while(*u_start  > MEAN_HIT_NUMBER_LINEAR_APPROX_LIMIT){
00455                 *u_start                        =               0.5f * (*u_start);
00456                 (*n_convolutions)++;
00457         }
00458 
00459         // Every convolution will add a factor of two, so the array for f has to
00460         // be expanded from f1 by N2 * n_convolutions
00461         *n_bins_f                       =       (*n_convolutions + 1) * (*N2);
00462         *n_bins_f                       +=      *n_bins_f1;
00463 
00464 #ifdef _DEBUG
00465         fprintf(debf,"%soutput - n_bins_f = %ld\n", isp, *n_bins_f);
00466         fprintf(debf,"%soutput - u_start = %g\n", isp, *u_start);
00467         fprintf(debf,"%soutput - n_convolutions = %ld\n", isp, *n_convolutions);
00468         fprintf(debf,"%send SGP_SC_get_f_array_size\n",isp);
00469         indnt_dec();
00470 #endif
00471 
00472         return;
00473 }

00475 
00476 void    SGP_SC_get_f_start(                     float*  u_start,
00477                 long*   n_bins_f1,
00478                 long*   N2,
00479                 float*  f1_d_Gy,
00480                 float*  f1_dd_Gy,
00481                 float*  f1,
00482                 long*   n_bins_f,
00483                 // from here: return values
00484                 float*  f_d_Gy,
00485                 float*  f_dd_Gy,
00486                 float*  f_start)
00487 {
00488 #ifdef _DEBUG
00489         indnt_init();
00490         indnt_inc();
00491         long q;
00492         fprintf(debf,"%sbegin SGP_SC_get_f_start\n", isp);
00493         fprintf(debf,"%sinput - u_start = %g\n", isp, *u_start);
00494         fprintf(debf,"%sinput - n_bins_f1 = %ld\n", isp, *n_bins_f1);
00495         fprintf(debf,"%sinput - n_bins_f = %ld\n", isp, *n_bins_f);
00496         fprintf(debf,"%sinput - N2 = %ld\n", isp, *N2);
00497         //fprintf(debf,"%sinput - f1_d_Gy[] = ", isp);
00498         //for( q = 0 ; q < *n_bins_f1 ; q++ ){ fprintf(debf,"%g,",f1_d_Gy[q]);};        fprintf(debf,"\n");
00499 #endif
00500 
00501         // conversion through int
00502 #ifdef _R
00503         int N2_int = (int)(*N2);
00504         *N2 = (long)N2_int;
00505 
00506         int n_bins_f1_int = (int)(*n_bins_f1);
00507         *n_bins_f1 = (long)n_bins_f1_int;
00508 
00509         int n_bins_f_int = (int)(*n_bins_f);
00510         *n_bins_f = (long)n_bins_f_int;
00511 #endif
00512 
00513 
00514         // temporary arrays
00515         float*  d_low                           =       (float*)calloc(*n_bins_f, sizeof(float));
00516         float*  d_high                          =       (float*)calloc(*n_bins_f, sizeof(float));
00517 
00518         float   U                                       =       (float)(log(2.0f) / (float)(*N2));
00519 
00520         long    i;
00521         for (i = 0; i < *n_bins_f; i++){
00522                 d_low[i]                                        =       f1_d_Gy[0] * (float)exp(((float)i - 0.5f)* U);
00523                 d_high[i]                                       =       f1_d_Gy[0] * (float)exp(((float)i + 0.5f)* U);
00524                 if (i < *n_bins_f1){
00525                         f_d_Gy[i]                                       =       f1_d_Gy[i];
00526                         f_dd_Gy[i]                                      =       f1_dd_Gy[i];
00527                         f_start[i]                                      =       f1[i];}
00528                 else{
00529                         f_d_Gy[i]                                       =       (float)sqrt(d_low[i] * d_high[i]);
00530                         f_dd_Gy[i]                                      =       d_high[i] - d_low[i];
00531                         f_start[i]                                      =       0.0f;}
00532         }
00533 
00534         free(d_low);
00535         free(d_high);
00536 
00537 #ifdef _DEBUG
00538         fprintf(debf,"%soutput - f_d_Gy[] = ", isp);
00539         for( q = 0 ; q < *n_bins_f ; q++ ){ fprintf(debf,"%g,",f_d_Gy[q]);};    fprintf(debf,"\n");
00540         fprintf(debf,"%soutput - f_d_Gy[] = %g,%g,%g,...\n", isp, f_d_Gy[0], f_d_Gy[1], f_d_Gy[2]);
00541         fprintf(debf,"%soutput - f_dd_Gy[] = %g,%g,%g,...\n", isp, f_dd_Gy[0], f_dd_Gy[1], f_dd_Gy[2]);
00542         fprintf(debf,"%soutput - f_start[] = %g,%g,%g,...\n", isp, f_start[0], f_start[1], f_start[2]);
00543         fprintf(debf,"%send SGP_SC_get_f_start\n",isp);
00544         indnt_dec();
00545 #endif
00546 
00547         return;
00548 }
00549 
00550 /*******************************************************************************
00551 / Successive convolutions (Kellerer Algorithm)
00552  *******************************************************************************/
00553 
00554 typedef struct{
00555 
00556         long                    array_size;                                                                     // size of function arrays F..BI
00557         long                    N2;
00558         float                   U;
00559 
00560         float                   X;
00561         float                   FINAL;
00562 
00563 
00564         float                   CN;
00565         long                    N1;
00566 
00567 
00568         float                   CM1;
00569         float                   CM2;
00570         float                   CM3;
00571         float                   CM4;
00572 
00573         float                   D1;
00574         float                   D2;
00575         float                   D3;
00576         float                   D4;
00577 
00578         float                   F0;
00579         float*                  F;
00580         long                    MIF;
00581         long                    LEF;
00582 
00583         float                   H0;
00584         float*                  H;
00585         long                    MIH;
00586         long                    LEH;
00587 
00588         float                   E0;
00589         float*                  E;
00590         float*                  DE;
00591         long                    MIE;
00592 
00593         float*                  DI;
00594         float*                  A;
00595         float*                  BI;
00596 
00597         bool                    write_output;
00598         FILE*                   output_file;
00599 
00600         bool                    shrink_tails;
00601         float                   shrink_tails_under;
00602         bool                    adjust_N2;
00603 }       aKList;
00604 
00605 
00606 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00607 // SGP_SC_NORMAL
00608 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00609 aKList  SGP_SC_NORMAL(aKList theKList){
00610 
00611         if(theKList.write_output){
00612                 fprintf(theKList.output_file,   "\n\nThis is subroutine SGP_SC_NORMAL\n");
00613                 fprintf(theKList.output_file,       "=========================\n");
00614         }
00615 
00616         float   Y                                       = theKList.CM1 * 2;
00617         float   Z                                       = theKList.CM2 * 2;
00618         float   CM0                                     = theKList.H0;
00619         theKList.CM1            = 0;
00620 
00621         long            N                                       = theKList.MIH - theKList.MIE;
00622         long            L;
00623         for (L = 1; L <= theKList.LEH; L++){
00624                 long            LE                                      =               L + N;
00625                 float   S                                       =               theKList.H[L-1] * theKList.DE[LE-1];
00626 
00627                 CM0                                     =               CM0 + S;
00628                 theKList.CM1            =               theKList.CM1 + S * theKList.E[LE-1];
00629         }
00630 
00631         float   TT                                      =               (1.0f - theKList.H0) / (CM0 - theKList.H0);
00632         theKList.CM1            =               theKList.CM1 * TT;
00633         float   R                                       =               theKList.CM1 * theKList.CM1;
00634         theKList.CM2            =               R * theKList.H0;
00635         theKList.CM3            =               -1.0f * theKList.CM1 * R * theKList.H0;
00636         theKList.CM4            =               R * R * theKList.H0;
00637 
00638         for (L = 1; L <= theKList.LEH; L++){
00639                 long            LE                                      =               L + N;
00640                 float   EC                                      =               theKList.E[LE-1] - theKList.CM1;
00641                 float   E2                                      =               EC * EC;
00642                 theKList.H[L-1]         =               theKList.H[L-1] * TT;
00643                 float   S                                       =               theKList.H[L-1] * theKList.DE[LE-1] * E2;
00644                 theKList.CM2            =               theKList.CM2 + S;
00645                 theKList.CM3            =               theKList.CM3 + S * EC;
00646                 theKList.CM4            =               theKList.CM4 + S * E2;
00647         }
00648 
00649         theKList.X                      =       theKList.X * CM0;
00650         Y                                       =       theKList.CM1 / Y;
00651         Z                                       =       theKList.CM2 / Z;
00652 
00653         if(theKList.write_output){
00654                 if(theKList.N1 > 0){
00655                         fprintf(theKList.output_file,   "\nPrecision control (ratio actual/theoretical):\n");
00656                         fprintf(theKList.output_file,   "Norm:\t\t %4.3e\n", theKList.X);
00657                         fprintf(theKList.output_file,   "Mean:\t\t %4.3e\n", Y);
00658                         fprintf(theKList.output_file,   "Var:\t\t %4.3e\n", Z);
00659                 }else{
00660                         fprintf(theKList.output_file,   "\nSingle hit distribution integral:\t\t %4.3e\n", CM0);
00661                 }
00662         }
00663 
00664         return(theKList);
00665 }
00666 
00667 
00668 
00669 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00670 // SGP_SC_OUTPUT
00671 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00672 aKList  SGP_SC_OUTPUT(aKList theKList){
00673 
00674         if(theKList.write_output){
00675                 fprintf(theKList.output_file,   "\n\nThis is subroutine SGP_SC_OUTPUT\n");
00676                 fprintf(theKList.output_file,       "=========================\n");
00677         }
00678 
00679         //float*        SD                                              =       (float*)calloc(theKList.array_size, sizeof(float));
00680 
00681         float   B                                               =       theKList.CM2 / (theKList.CM1 * theKList.CM1);
00682         float   C                                               =       theKList.CM3 / (float)sqrt(theKList.CM2 * theKList.CM2 * theKList.CM2);
00683         float   D                                               =       theKList.CM4 / (theKList.CM2 * theKList.CM2);
00684         float   S1                                              =       theKList.CN * theKList.D1;
00685         float   S2                                              =       theKList.CN * theKList.D2 / (S1 * S1);
00686         float   S3                                              =       theKList.D3 / (float)sqrt(theKList.CN * theKList.D2 * theKList.D2 * theKList.D2);
00687         float   S4                                              =       theKList.D4 / (theKList.D2 * theKList.D2 * theKList.CN) + 3;
00688 
00689         if(theKList.N1 <= 0){
00690                 S2                                                              =       B;
00691                 S3                                                              =       C;
00692                 S4                                                              =       D;}
00693 
00694         if(theKList.write_output){
00695                 fprintf(        theKList.output_file,
00696                                 "\nZero component:\t\t%4.3e\n",
00697                                 theKList.H0);
00698 
00699                 fprintf(        theKList.output_file,
00700                                 "\nMean\t\t\t\t\tActual:\t%4.3e\tTheory:\t%4.3e\n",
00701                                 theKList.CM1, S1);
00702                 fprintf(        theKList.output_file,
00703                                 "Variance/Mean^2\t\t\tActual:\t%4.3e\tTheory:\t%4.3e\n",
00704                                 B, S2);
00705                 fprintf(        theKList.output_file,
00706                                 "Central3/Variance^3/2\tActual:\t%4.3e\tTheory:\t%4.3e\n",
00707                                 C, S3);
00708                 fprintf(        theKList.output_file,
00709                                 "Central4/Variance^2\t\tActual:\t%4.3e\tTheory:\t%4.3e\n",
00710                                 D, S4);
00711 
00712                 fprintf(        theKList.output_file,
00713                                 "\nMIF: %ld, LEF: %ld, MIH: %ld, LEH: %ld, MIE: %ld\n\n",
00714                                 theKList.MIF,
00715                                 theKList.LEF,
00716                                 theKList.MIH,
00717                                 theKList.LEH,
00718                                 theKList.MIE);
00719 
00720                 fprintf(        theKList.output_file,
00721                                 "i\tE\t\t\tDE\t\t\tH\t\t\tF\n");
00722 
00723                 long    L;
00724                 for (L = 1; L <= theKList.array_size; L++){
00725                         fprintf(        theKList.output_file,
00726                                         "%ld\t%4.3e\t%4.3e\t%4.3e\t%4.3e\n",
00727                                         L,
00728                                         theKList.E[L-1],
00729                                         theKList.DE[L-1],
00730                                         theKList.H[L-1],
00731                                         theKList.F[L-1]);
00732                 }
00733         }
00734 
00735         return(theKList);
00736 }
00737 
00738 
00739 
00740 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00741 // SGP_SC_INTERP
00742 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00743 
00744 aKList  SGP_SC_INTERP(aKList theKList){
00745 
00746         theKList.A[1-1]                                 =       theKList.F[2-1] - theKList.F[1-1];
00747         theKList.BI[1-1]                                =       0.0f;
00748         theKList.F[theKList.LEF + 1 - 1]=       0.0f;
00749 
00750         long    K;
00751         for (K = 1; K <= theKList.N2; K++){
00752                 long L                                  =       theKList.LEF + K;
00753                 theKList.A[L-1]                 =       0.0f;
00754                 theKList.BI[L-1]                =       0.0f;
00755         }
00756 
00757         long    L;
00758         for (L = 2; L <= theKList.LEF; L++){
00759                 theKList.A[L -1]                =       0.5f * (theKList.F[L + 1 -1] - theKList.F[L - 1 -1]);
00760                 theKList.BI[L -1]               =       theKList.A[L-1] + theKList.F[L - 1 -1] - theKList.F[L -1];
00761         }
00762 
00763         return(theKList);
00764 }
00765 
00766 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00767 // SGP_SC_RESET
00768 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00769 
00770 aKList  SGP_SC_RESET(aKList theKList){
00771 
00772         if (theKList.N2 <= 256){
00773                 if(theKList.LEF <= 64){
00774                         float S                                                 =       (float)log(2.0f);
00775                         float TT                                                =       (float)theKList.N2;
00776                         //                      theKList.N2                                             =       theKList.N2 * 2;
00777                         theKList.N2                                             +=      (long)(0.1 + exp((float)((long)(log(TT) / S - 0.99f)) * S));
00778                         TT                                                              =       TT / (float)theKList.N2;
00779                         theKList.U                                              =       S / (float)theKList.N2;
00780 
00781                         if(theKList.write_output){
00782                                 fprintf(theKList.output_file,                   "\n\nThis is subroutine SGP_SC_RESET\n");
00783                                 fprintf(theKList.output_file,                   "========================\n");
00784                                 fprintf(theKList.output_file,                   "\nCoordinate change with new N2: %ld\n", theKList.N2);
00785                         }
00786 
00787                         theKList                                                =       SGP_SC_INTERP(theKList);
00788                         theKList.F[theKList.LEF + 1 -1] =       0;
00789                         long N                                                  =       theKList.MIF;
00790                         theKList.MIF                                    =       (long)((float)theKList.MIF / TT) + 1;           /////////////////////
00791                         theKList.LEF                                    =       (long)((float)theKList.LEF / TT) - 1;           // added (SG) : -1 //
00792                         /////////////////////
00793                         long    K;
00794                         for (K = 1; K <= theKList.LEF; K++){
00795                                 long   L                                                =       theKList.LEF - K + 1;
00796                                 float  FLF                                              =       (float)(L + theKList.MIF) * TT - (float)N;
00797                                 long   LFF                                              =       (long)(FLF + 0.5f);
00798                                 float S                                                 =       FLF - (float)LFF;
00799 
00800                                 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00801                                 // Replaced Kellerer's original quadratic interpolation by a slower           //
00802                                 // but more correct approach. The original produced wrong interpolation &     //
00803                                 // negative values of F on the new N2's grid at very steep, irregular parts   //
00804                                 // of F and eventually systematic deviation of moments.                       //
00805                                 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00806 
00807                                 // original:    theKList.F[L -1]                                =       theKList.F[LFF -1] + S * (theKList.A[LFF - 1] + S * theKList.BI[LFF - 1]);
00808 
00809                                 theKList.F[L -1]                                =       theKList.F[LFF -1];
00810                                 if((S < 0 ) && (LFF >= 2)){
00811                                         theKList.F[L -1]                        =       (float)(pow(theKList.F[LFF - 1 -1], -1.0f * S) * pow(theKList.F[LFF -1], 1.0f + S));
00812                                 }
00813                                 if((S > 0 ) && (LFF <= theKList.LEF - 1)){
00814                                         theKList.F[L -1]                        =       (float)(pow(theKList.F[LFF -1], 1.0f - S) * pow(theKList.F[LFF + 1 -1], S));
00815                                 }
00816                         }
00817 
00818                         long    L;
00819                         for (L = theKList.N2; L <= theKList.array_size; L++){;
00820                         float S                                 = (float)(L - theKList.N2) * theKList.U;
00821                         float tmp                               = (float)(-1.0f * log(1.0f - 0.5f * exp(-S)) / theKList.U);
00822                         theKList.DI[L -1]               = tmp - (float)theKList.N2;             // type casts necessary to prevent round of errors (that will eventually yield negative H-values in SGP_SC_FOLD
00823                         }
00824 
00825                         theKList.MIE                                    =       theKList.MIF;
00826 
00827                         long    J;
00828                         for (J = 1; J <= theKList.array_size; J++){
00829                                 float S                                         =       (float)(J + theKList.MIE);
00830                                 theKList.E[J -1]                        =       (float)exp(S * theKList.U) * theKList.E0;
00831                                 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00832                                 // addition SG: not to use Kellerer's formula for new DE's, as it is     //
00833                                 // not exact (but deviation are small)                                   //
00834                                 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00835                                 float* high_E                           =       (float*)calloc(theKList.array_size, sizeof(float));
00836                                 S                                                       =       (float)(J + theKList.MIE + 1);
00837                                 high_E[J - 1]                           =       (float)exp(S * theKList.U) * theKList.E0;
00838                                 theKList.DE[J -1]                       =       high_E[J -1] - theKList.E[J -1];
00839                                 free(high_E);
00840                         }
00841                 }else{
00842                         return(theKList);
00843                 }
00844         }else{
00845                 theKList.MIE                                    =       theKList.MIF;
00846 
00847                 long    J;
00848                 for (J = 1; J <= theKList.array_size; J++){
00849                         float S                                         =       (float)(J + theKList.MIE);
00850                         theKList.E[J -1]                        =       (float)exp(S * theKList.U) * theKList.E0;
00851                         ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00852                         // addition SG: not to use Kellerer's formula for new DE's, as it is     //
00853                         // not exact (but deviation are small)                                   //
00854                         ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00855                         float* high_E                           =       (float*)calloc(theKList.array_size, sizeof(float));
00856                         S                                                       =       (float)(J + theKList.MIE + 1);
00857                         high_E[J - 1]                           =       (float)exp(S * theKList.U) * theKList.E0;
00858                         theKList.DE[J -1]                       =       high_E[J -1] - theKList.E[J -1];
00859                         free(high_E);
00860                 }
00861         }
00862 
00863         return(theKList);
00864 }
00865 
00866 
00867 
00868 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00869 // SGP_SC_ZERO
00870 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00871 
00872 aKList  SGP_SC_ZERO(aKList theKList){
00873 
00874         if(theKList.write_output){
00875                 fprintf(theKList.output_file,                   "\n\nThis is subroutine SGP_SC_ZERO\n");
00876                 fprintf(theKList.output_file,                   "========================\n");
00877         }
00878 
00879         theKList.X                                      =       0;
00880         long N                                          =       theKList.MIH - theKList.MIE;
00881 
00882         long    L;
00883         for (L = 1; L <= theKList.LEH; L++){
00884                 long K                                  =       L + N;
00885                 theKList.X                              =       theKList.X + theKList.H[L -1] * theKList.DE[K -1];
00886         }
00887 
00888         float S                                 =       (1.0f - theKList.F0) * (1.0f - theKList.F0) / theKList.X;
00889         theKList.X                              =       2.0f / S;
00890 
00891         for (L = 1; L <= theKList.LEH; L++){;
00892         theKList.H[L -1]                =       theKList.H[L -1] * S;
00893         }
00894 
00895         N                                                       =       theKList.MIH - theKList.MIF;
00896         theKList.MIH                            =       theKList.MIF;
00897         theKList.LEH                            =       theKList.LEH + N;
00898 
00899         long    LL;
00900         for (LL = 1; LL <= theKList.LEH; LL++){
00901                 long L                                          =       theKList.LEH + 1 - LL;
00902                 long K                                          =       L + N;
00903                 theKList.H[K -1]                        =       theKList.H[L -1];
00904         }
00905 
00906         for (L = 1; L <= N; L++){
00907                 theKList.H[L -1]                        =       0.0f;
00908         }
00909 
00910         S                                                       =       theKList.F0 * 2.0f;
00911 
00912         for (L = 1; L <= theKList.LEF; L++){
00913                 theKList.H[L -1]                        =       theKList.H[L -1] + theKList.F[L -1] * S;
00914         }
00915 
00916         return(theKList);
00917 
00918 }
00919 
00920 
00921 
00922 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00923 // SGP_SC_SHRINK
00924 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00925 
00926 aKList  SGP_SC_SHRINK(aKList theKList){
00927 
00928         float   EX                                              =       theKList.shrink_tails_under;
00929         float   S                                               =       0.0;
00930         long    N                                               =       theKList.MIH - theKList.MIE;
00931 
00932         long    L;
00933         for (L = 1; L <= theKList.LEH; L++){
00934                 long K                                                  =       L + N;
00935                 S                                                               =       S + theKList.H[L -1] * theKList.DE[K -1];
00936                 if(S > 1000.0 * EX){
00937                         theKList.MIH                            =       theKList.MIH + L - 1;
00938                         break;}
00939         }
00940 
00941         long            M                                               =       L - 1;
00942         S                                                               =       0;
00943 
00944         long    K;
00945         for (K = 1; K <= theKList.LEH; K++){
00946                 L                                                               =       theKList.LEH + 1 - K;
00947                 long KK                                                 =       L + N;
00948                 S                                                               =       S + theKList.H[L - 1] * theKList.DE[KK - 1];
00949                 if(S > EX){
00950                         break;
00951                 }
00952         }
00953 
00954         theKList.LEH                                    =       L - M;
00955         for (L = 1; L <= theKList.LEH; L++){
00956                 K                                                               =       L + M;
00957                 theKList.H[L -1]                                =       theKList.H[K -1];
00958         }
00959 
00960         K                                                               =       theKList.LEH + 1;
00961         long    KK                                                      =       theKList.LEH + M;
00962         for (L = K; L <= KK; L++){
00963                 theKList.H[L -1]                                =       0;
00964         }
00965 
00966         return(theKList);
00967 
00968 }
00969 
00970 
00971 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00972 // SGP_SC_FOLD
00973 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00974 
00975 aKList  SGP_SC_FOLD(aKList theKList){
00976 
00977 //#ifdef _DEBUG
00978 //      indnt_inc();
00979 //      fprintf(debf,"%sbegin SGP_SC_FOLD, size = %ld\n", isp, theKList.array_size);
00980 //#endif
00981 
00982         float*  FDE                                     =       (float*)calloc(theKList.array_size, sizeof(float));
00983 
00984         if((theKList.CN >= 10.0) && (theKList.adjust_N2 == true)){
00985                 theKList                                        =       SGP_SC_RESET(theKList);
00986         }
00987 
00988         theKList.H0                                     =       theKList.F0 * theKList.F0;
00989         theKList.MIH                            =       theKList.MIF + theKList.N2;
00990         theKList.LEH                            =       theKList.LEF;
00991         long    K                                       =       theKList.LEF + 1;
00992         long KK                                         =       K + theKList.N2;
00993 
00994         long    L;
00995         for (L = K; L <= KK; L++){
00996                 theKList.F[L -1]                        =       0;
00997         }
00998 
00999         theKList                                        =       SGP_SC_INTERP(theKList);
01000         long N                                          =       theKList.MIF - theKList.MIE;
01001 
01002         for (L = 1; L <= theKList.LEH; L++){
01003                 K                                                       =       L + N;
01004                 FDE[L -1]                                       =       theKList.F[L -1] * theKList.DE[K -1];
01005         }
01006 
01007         long    LH;
01008         for (LH = 1; LH <= theKList.LEH; LH++){
01009                 float   HLH                                     =       0;
01010                 long    LL                                      =       LH + theKList.N2;
01011                 long    LF;
01012                 for (LF = 1; LF <= LH; LF++){
01013                         K                                                       =       LL - LF;
01014                         float FLF                                       =       (float)LH - theKList.DI[K -1];
01015                         long LFF                                        =       (long)(FLF + 0.5f);
01016                         float S                                         =       FLF - (float)LFF;
01017                         ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01018                         // Modification SG: if Kellerer's quadratic interpolation fails, use simple estimate
01019                         float tmp                                       =       theKList.F[LFF -1] + S * (theKList.A[LFF -1] + S * theKList.BI[LFF -1]);
01020                         if (tmp <0){
01021                                 tmp = 0.0f;                             // Very crude - better to replace by interpolation as done in RESET
01022                         }                                                       // which is time-consuming, however.
01023                         ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01024                         HLH                                                     =       HLH + FDE[LF -1] * tmp;
01025                 }
01026                 theKList.H[LH -1]                       =       HLH - FDE[LH -1] * theKList.F[LH -1] * 0.5f;
01027         }
01028 
01029         free(FDE);
01030 
01031         if (theKList.F0 < 1e-10){
01032                 theKList.X                                              =       2.0f;
01033         }else{
01034                 theKList                                                =       SGP_SC_ZERO(theKList);
01035         }
01036 
01037 //#ifdef _DEBUG
01038 //      fprintf(debf,"%send SGP_SC_FOLD\n", isp);
01039 //      indnt_dec();
01040 //#endif
01041 
01042         return(theKList);
01043 }
01044 
01045 
01046 
01047 void     SGP_SuccessiveConvolutions(                            float*  u,
01048                 long*   n_bins_f,
01049                 long*   N2,
01050                 long*   n_bins_f_used,
01051                 float*  f_d_Gy,
01052                 float*  f_dd_Gy,
01053                 float*  f,
01054                 float*  f0,
01055                 float*  fdd,                                                                    // frequence:                   H * DE                  (f * dd)
01056                 float*  dfdd,                                                                   // dose contribution:   H * E * DE              (f * d * dd)
01057                 float*  d,                                                                              // first moment:                                                (<d>)
01058                 bool*   write_output,
01059                 bool*   shrink_tails,
01060                 float*  shrink_tails_under,
01061                 bool*   adjust_N2)
01062 {
01063 
01064         // conversion through int
01065 #ifdef _R
01066         int n_bins_f_int = (int)(*n_bins_f);
01067         *n_bins_f = (long)n_bins_f_int;
01068 
01069         int N2_int = (int)(*N2);
01070         *N2 = (long)N2_int;
01071 
01072         int n_bins_f_used_int = (int)(*n_bins_f_used);
01073         *n_bins_f_used = (long)n_bins_f_used_int;
01074 #endif
01075 
01076 #ifdef _DEBUG
01077         indnt_init();
01078         indnt_inc();
01079         long q;
01080         fprintf(debf,"%sbegin SGP_SuccessiveConvolutions\n", isp);
01081         fprintf(debf,"%sinput - u = %g\n", isp, *u);
01082         fprintf(debf,"%sinput - n_bins_f = %ld\n", isp, *n_bins_f);
01083         fprintf(debf,"%sinput - N2 = %ld\n", isp, *N2);
01084         fprintf(debf,"%sinput - n_bins_f_used = %ld\n", isp, *n_bins_f_used);
01085         fprintf(debf,"%sinput - f_d_Gy[] = ", isp);
01086         for( q = 0 ; q < *n_bins_f ; q++ ){ fprintf(debf,"%g,",f_d_Gy[q]);};    fprintf(debf,"\n");
01087         fprintf(debf,"%sinput - f_dd_Gy[] = %g,%g,%g,...\n", isp, f_dd_Gy[0], f_dd_Gy[1], f_dd_Gy[2]);
01088         fprintf(debf,"%sinput - f[] = %g,%g,%g,...\n", isp, f[0], f[1], f[2]);
01089         fprintf(debf,"%sinput - f0 = %g\n", isp, *f0);
01090         fprintf(debf,"%sinput - fdd[] = %g,%g,%g,...\n", isp, fdd[0], fdd[1], fdd[2]);
01091         fprintf(debf,"%sinput - dfdd[] = %g,%g,%g,...\n", isp, dfdd[0], dfdd[1], dfdd[2]);
01092         fprintf(debf,"%sinput - d = %g\n", isp, *d);
01093         fprintf(debf,"%sinput - shrink_tails_under = %g\n", isp, *shrink_tails_under);
01094         fprintf(debf,"%sinput - write_output = %d\n", isp, *write_output);
01095         fprintf(debf,"%sinput - shrink_tails = %d\n", isp, *shrink_tails);
01096         fprintf(debf,"%sinput - adjust_N2 = %d\n", isp, *adjust_N2);
01097 #endif
01098         // index variables
01099         long            i;
01100 
01101 #ifdef _DEBUG
01102         fprintf(debf,"%sn_bins_f_used = %ld\n", isp, *n_bins_f_used);
01103 #endif
01104 
01105         //////////////////////////////////////////
01106         // Init KList structure
01107         // (Constructor)
01108         //////////////////////////////////////////
01109         aKList KList;
01110 
01111         KList.array_size        = *n_bins_f;
01112         KList.N2                        = *N2;
01113         KList.U                         = (float)log(2.0f) / KList.N2;
01114 
01115         //////////////////////////////////
01116 
01117         KList.write_output              =       *write_output;
01118         if(KList.write_output){
01119                 KList.output_file               =       fopen("SuccessiveConvolutions.log","w");
01120                 if (KList.output_file == NULL) return;                                                                                  // File error
01121 
01122                 fprintf(KList.output_file, "##############################################################\n");
01123                 fprintf(KList.output_file, "##############################################################\n");
01124                 fprintf(KList.output_file, "This is LGC2.2 core - successive convolution mode (2008/08/12).\n");
01125         }
01126 
01127         //////////////////////////////////
01128 
01129         KList.shrink_tails              =       *shrink_tails;
01130         KList.shrink_tails_under=       *shrink_tails_under;
01131         KList.adjust_N2                 =       *adjust_N2;
01132 
01133         //////////////////////////////////
01134 
01135 #ifdef _DEBUG
01136         fprintf(debf,"%sKList.array_size = %ld\n", isp, KList.array_size);
01137 #endif
01138 
01139         KList.F                         = (float*)calloc(KList.array_size, sizeof(float));
01140         KList.H                         = (float*)calloc(KList.array_size, sizeof(float));
01141         KList.E                         = (float*)calloc(KList.array_size, sizeof(float));
01142         KList.DE                        = (float*)calloc(KList.array_size, sizeof(float));
01143         KList.DI                        = (float*)calloc(KList.array_size, sizeof(float));
01144         KList.A                         = (float*)calloc(KList.array_size, sizeof(float));
01145         KList.BI                        = (float*)calloc(KList.array_size, sizeof(float));
01146 
01147         // Some other initializations
01148         KList.MIH                       = 0;
01149         KList.MIE                       = 0;
01150         KList.N1                        = 0;
01151         KList.H0                        = 0;
01152         KList.X                         = 1;
01153         KList.CN                        = 1;
01154         KList.CM1                       = 1;
01155         KList.CM2                       = 1;
01156 
01157         // Added by Leszek
01158         KList.MIF                       = 0;
01159         KList.LEF                       = 0;
01160 
01161 
01162         if(KList.write_output){
01163                 fprintf(KList.output_file,      "\n\nThis is main\n");
01164                 fprintf(KList.output_file,          "============\n");
01165         }
01166 
01167         // Copy input data
01168         KList.E0                        = f_d_Gy[1-1] * (float)exp(-1.0f * KList.U);
01169 
01170         long    L;
01171         for (L = 1; L <= KList.array_size; L++){
01172                 KList.E[L -1]                   = f_d_Gy[L -1];
01173                 KList.DE[L -1]                  = f_dd_Gy[L -1];
01174                 KList.H[L -1]                   = f[L -1];
01175         }
01176 
01177         KList.LEH                               = *n_bins_f_used;
01178 
01179         ///////////////////////////////////////
01180         // Fill array for auxilary function that enables easy index operations
01181         for     (L = KList.N2; L <= KList.array_size; L++){
01182                 float S                         = (float)(L - KList.N2) * KList.U;
01183                 float tmp                       = (float)(-1.0f * log(1.0f - 0.5f * exp(-S)) / KList.U);
01184                 KList.DI[L -1]          = tmp - (float)KList.N2;}               // type casts necessary to prevent round of errors (that will eventually yield negative H-values in SGP_SC_FOLD
01185 
01186 
01187 
01188         ///////////////////////////////////////
01189         // Normalize distribution
01190         ///////////////////////////////////////
01191         KList   = SGP_SC_NORMAL(KList);
01192 
01193         if(KList.write_output){
01194                 fprintf(KList.output_file,      "\n\nThis is main\n");
01195                 fprintf(KList.output_file,          "============\n");
01196 
01197                 fprintf(KList.output_file, "\nNormalized single hit distribution in KList:\n");
01198                 for (i = 0; i < KList.array_size; i++){
01199                         fprintf(        KList.output_file,
01200                                         "i: %ld\t\tKList.E: %4.3e Gy\t\tKList.DE: %4.3e\t\tKList.H: %4.3e\t\t\n",
01201                                         i,
01202                                         KList.E[i],
01203                                         KList.DE[i],
01204                                         KList.H[i]);
01205                 }
01206 
01207                 fprintf(KList.output_file,      "\n\nThis is main\n");
01208                 fprintf(KList.output_file,          "============\n");
01209 
01210                 fprintf(KList.output_file, "\nMoments of the single hit distribution:\n");
01211         }
01212 
01213         ///////////////////////////////////////
01214         // Get moments of single impact f1
01215         ///////////////////////////////////////
01216 
01217         KList.D1                =               KList.CM1;
01218         float   S                               =               KList.D1 * KList.D1;
01219         KList.D2                =               KList.CM2 + S;
01220         KList.D3                =               KList.CM3 + 3.0f * KList.CM2 * KList.D1 + S * KList.D1;
01221         KList.D4                =               KList.CM4 + 4.0f * KList.CM3 * KList.D1 + 6.0f * S * KList.CM2 + S * S;
01222 
01223         float   S2                              =               KList.D2 / KList.D1;
01224         float   S3                              =               KList.D3 / KList.D1;
01225         float   S4                              =               KList.D4 / KList.D1;
01226         S                               =               S3 / (float)sqrt(S2 * S2 * S2);
01227         float   TT                              =               S4      / (S2 * S2);
01228 
01229         if(KList.write_output){
01230                 fprintf(        KList.output_file,
01231                                 "\nInitial distribution:\n");
01232                 fprintf(        KList.output_file,
01233                                 "Delta 1:\t\t%4.3e\n",
01234                                 KList.D1);
01235                 fprintf(        KList.output_file,
01236                                 "Delta 2:\t\t%4.3e\n",
01237                                 KList.D2);
01238 
01239                 fprintf(        KList.output_file,
01240                                 "\nCharacteristics of the solution to the mean value E\n");
01241                 fprintf(        KList.output_file,
01242                                 "Rel. variance:\t%4.3e / E\n",
01243                                 S2);
01244                 fprintf(        KList.output_file,
01245                                 "Skewness:\t\t%4.3e / sqrt(E)\n",
01246                                 S);
01247                 fprintf(        KList.output_file,
01248                                 "Kurtosis:\t\t%4.3e / E + 3\n",
01249                                 TT);
01250         }
01251 
01252 
01253         ///////////////////////////////////////
01254         // SGP_SC_SHRINK distribution
01255         ///////////////////////////////////////
01256         if(KList.shrink_tails){
01257                 KList   = SGP_SC_SHRINK(KList);
01258         }
01259 
01260         ///////////////////////////////////////
01261         // SGP_SC_OUTPUT
01262         ///////////////////////////////////////
01263         KList   = SGP_SC_OUTPUT(KList);
01264 
01265         ///////////////////////////////////////
01266         // Get approximation for small hit
01267         // numbers
01268         ///////////////////////////////////////
01269 
01270         KList.FINAL                             = *u * KList.D1;        // Final mean impact number
01271 
01272         long n_convolutions             = 0;
01273         KList.CN                                =               KList.FINAL     / KList.D1;
01274         while(KList.CN > MEAN_HIT_NUMBER_LINEAR_APPROX_LIMIT){
01275                 KList.CN                                =               0.5f * KList.CN;
01276                 n_convolutions++;
01277         }
01278 
01279         if(KList.write_output){
01280                 fprintf(KList.output_file,      "\n\nThis is main\n");
01281                 fprintf(KList.output_file,          "============\n");
01282 
01283                 fprintf(        KList.output_file,      "\nSmall hit number approximation:\n");
01284                 fprintf(        KList.output_file,
01285                                 "\nTarget hit value:\t%4.3e\t\tStart hit value:\t%4.3e\t\tNumber of convolutions:\t%ld\n",
01286                                 *u,
01287                                 KList.CN,
01288                                 n_convolutions);
01289         }
01290 
01291         KList.H0                                =               1.0f - KList.CN;
01292 
01293         for (L = 1; L <= KList.LEH; L++){
01294                 KList.H[L -1]                   =       KList.H[L -1] * KList.CN;
01295         }
01296 
01297         ///////////////////////////////////////
01298         // Convolution loop
01299         ///////////////////////////////////////
01300         long    j;
01301         for(j = 0; j < n_convolutions; j++){
01302                 KList.N1                                =       KList.N1 + 1;
01303                 KList.CN                                =       KList.CN * 2;
01304 
01305 //#ifdef _DEBUG
01306 //              fprintf(debf,"%sj = %ld out ouf %ld\n", isp, j , n_convolutions);
01307 //              fprintf(debf,"%sKList.LEH = %ld\n", isp, KList.LEH);
01308 //#endif
01309 
01310                 if(KList.write_output){
01311                         fprintf(        KList.output_file,
01312                                         "\n\n##############################################################\n");
01313                         fprintf(        KList.output_file,      "\n\nThis is main\n");
01314                         fprintf(        KList.output_file,          "============\n");
01315 
01316                         fprintf(        KList.output_file,
01317                                         "\nConvolution number:\t\t%ld\nMean hit number:\t\t%4.3e\n",
01318                                         KList.N1,
01319                                         KList.CN);
01320                 }
01321 
01322                 for (L = 1; L <= KList.LEH; L++){
01323                         KList.F[L -1]                   =       KList.H[L -1];
01324                 }
01325 
01326                 KList.F0                                =       KList.H0;
01327                 KList.LEF                               =       KList.LEH;
01328                 KList.MIF                               =       KList.MIH;
01329                 KList                                   =       SGP_SC_FOLD(KList);
01330                 if(KList.shrink_tails){
01331                         KList                                   =       SGP_SC_SHRINK(KList);
01332                 }
01333                 KList                                   =       SGP_SC_NORMAL(KList);
01334                 KList                                   =       SGP_SC_OUTPUT(KList);
01335         }
01336 
01337 
01338         //////////////////////////////////////////
01339         // Copy results back to input structure
01340         // and adjust according to MIH, MIE
01341         //////////////////////////////////////////
01342 
01343         *d              = 0.0f;
01344 
01345         for (L = 1; L <= KList.array_size; L++){
01346                 f_d_Gy[L -1]                    =       0.0f;
01347                 f_dd_Gy[L -1]                   =       0.0f;
01348                 f[L -1]                                 =       0.0f;
01349                 fdd[L -1]                               =       0.0f;
01350                 dfdd[L -1]                              =       0.0f;}
01351 
01352         long    N                               = KList.MIH - KList.MIE;
01353         for (L = 1; L <= KList.LEH; L++){
01354                 long LE                                 =       L + N;
01355                 f_d_Gy[L -1]                    =       KList.E[LE -1];
01356                 f_dd_Gy[L -1]                   =       KList.DE[LE -1];
01357                 f[L -1]                                 =       KList.H[L-1];
01358                 fdd[L -1]                               =       f[L -1] * f_dd_Gy[L -1];
01359                 dfdd[L -1]                              =       fdd[L -1] * f_d_Gy[L -1];
01360                 *d                                              +=      dfdd[L -1];
01361         }
01362 
01363         *n_bins_f_used = KList.LEH;
01364 
01365         *f0                                             = KList.H0;
01366         *N2                                             = KList.N2;                     // could have been changed by RESET --> report back
01367 
01368         //////////////////////////////////////////
01369         // Free allocated KList structures
01370         // (Destructor)
01371         //////////////////////////////////////////
01372         free(KList.F);
01373         free(KList.H);
01374         free(KList.E);
01375         free(KList.DE);
01376         free(KList.DI);
01377         free(KList.A);
01378         free(KList.BI);
01379 
01380         if(KList.write_output){
01381                 fprintf(KList.output_file, "\n\nThis is main\n");
01382                 fprintf(KList.output_file, "============\n");
01383                 fprintf(KList.output_file, "\nDone.\n");
01384                 fprintf(KList.output_file, "##############################################################\n");
01385                 fprintf(KList.output_file, "##############################################################\n");
01386 
01387                 // Close file
01388                 fclose(KList.output_file);
01389         }
01390 
01391 #ifdef _DEBUG
01392         fprintf(debf,"%soutput - n_bins_f_used = %ld\n", isp, *n_bins_f_used);
01393         fprintf(debf,"%soutput - f_d_Gy[] = %g,%g,%g,...\n", isp, f_d_Gy[0], f_d_Gy[1], f_d_Gy[2]);
01394         fprintf(debf,"%soutput - f_dd_Gy[] = %g,%g,%g,...\n", isp, f_dd_Gy[0], f_dd_Gy[1], f_dd_Gy[2]);
01395         fprintf(debf,"%soutput - f[] = %g,%g,%g,...\n", isp, f[0], f[1], f[2]);
01396         fprintf(debf,"%soutput - f0 = %g\n", isp, *f0);
01397         fprintf(debf,"%soutput - fdd[] = %g,%g,%g,...\n", isp, fdd[0], fdd[1], fdd[2]);
01398         fprintf(debf,"%soutput - dfdd[] = %g,%g,%g,...\n", isp, dfdd[0], dfdd[1], dfdd[2]);
01399         fprintf(debf,"%soutput - d = %g\n", isp, *d);
01400         fprintf(debf,"%send SGP_SuccessiveConvolutions\n", isp);
01401         indnt_dec();
01402 #endif
01403         return;
01404 }
